text: "All the Small Things" is a 1999 song by Blink-182 and is the second single from their third studio album Enema of the State. It went to number 6 in the United States and Italy, number 2 in the United Kingdom and Scotland, number 7 in Sweden and Ireland, number 10 in Portugal and New Zealand, number 8 in Iceland and Australia, number 4 in Austria, number 18 in Canada, number 12 in Norway, number 11 in Germany, number 39 in the Netherlands and number 19 in Poland. ==Track listings== *All live tracks on the UK release were recorded at the Electric Ballroom, London, England, on November 30, 1999. ==References== Category:1999 songs Category:Power pop songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Blink-182 songs Category:Kelly Clarkson songs Category:Charlie Puth songs Category:Weezer songs
title: All the Small Things
